are not permitted anything made from it may be sold for profit as long as credit is given to me as the designer you may contact me through the website listed in the materials  medium weight 4 yarn i used bernat camouflage in pink  g hook  yarn needle notes 1 my gloves were 35 stitches from top to bottom chain any length + 2 for a turning chain 2 my thumb hole is made at row 12 if you need to have a wider piece for your hand just add width in the row 2-11 area you can also adjust where along that row your thumb hole is just follow the pattern within the and for the hole 3 row 19 is the decorative v_stitch row to adjust where that lays on your hand you can add width in the row 13-18 and row 20-23 area 4 row 1-12 or your adjusted width should be equal to the side of your palm to the thumb hole row 12-23 should be equal to the thumb hole across the back of your hand to the side the decorative row should be along the center of the back of your hand pattern © 2013 kim deister the crochet witch the crafty author all rights reserved http //thecraftyauthor kimdeister com stitches used double_crochet double_crochet half_double_crochet half_double_crochet instructions body chain 37 row 1 half_double_crochet in 3rd chain from hook and in each to end 35 row 2-11 chain 2 and turn half_double_crochet in each half_double_crochet to end 35 row 12 chain 2 and turn half_double_crochet in next 7 half_double_crochet double_crochet in next half_double_crochet chain 5 skip 5 double_crochet in next half_double_crochet half_double_crochet to end 35 row 13-18 repeat row 2 35 row 19 chain 2 and turn double_crochet in 1st half_double_crochet skip 1 double_crochet chain 1 double_crochet in next half_double_crochet * sk2 double_crochet chain 1 double_crochet in next half_double_crochet * repeat from * to * to last 2 stitches skip 1 double_crochet in last half_double_crochet 35 row 20-23 repeat row 2 35 finish off leaving long yarn for sewing side seam thumb join with slip_stitch in any st of thumb hole row 1 single_crochet in same st as join single_crochet 15 more around thumb hole join with slip_stitch in 1st single_crochet 16 row 2 chain 1 single_crochet in same and in each around join with slip_stitch in 1st single_crochet 16 row 3 chain 1 decrease over first 2 single_crochet single_crochet to last 2 single_crochet decrease over last 2 single_crochet join with slip_stitch in 1st single_crochet 14 row 4 chain 1 single_crochet in same and in each around join with slip_stitch in 1st single_crochet 14 row 5 chain 1 decrease over first 2 single_crochet single_crochet to last 2 single_crochet decrease over last 2 single_crochet join with slip_stitch
